org.ndacm.acmgroup.cnp.task

Class ServerTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ndacm.acmgroup.cnp.task.Task
      • org.ndacm.acmgroup.cnp.task.ServerTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateAccountTask, CreateSessionTask, DeleteSessionTask, JoinSessionTask, LoginTask

    public abstract class ServerTask
extends Task
    A task that should be executed by the server itself. Contains a reference to a server so that this task can be submitted to the CNPServer's ExecutorService. ServerTasks should not require serialization - tasks are not guaranteed to execute in order. ServerTasks should be used when a user task needs to be executed before that user has joined a session or opened a file. Since the CNPServer does not track the connections of all connected clients (that task is delegated to CNPSessions and ServerSourceFiles), a CNPConnection reference should be set upon receipt by the server, to allow for a task response to be sent directly back to the task sender.
